Title: Straw Dog (1)
Plot: Grace is haunted by an old case that she assisted on at the beginning of her career when she is asked to give evidence at the assailant's appeal hearing.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Tilly Vosburgh,  Joe van Moyland,  Andrew Turner,  Natalie J. Robb,  Dave Norman,  Ovidiu Matesan,  Emma Lowndes,  Billy Keating,  Terence Hillyer,  Dominic Kemp,  Christopher Godwin,  Paul Freeman,  Tom Ellis,
